text: Stélio Marcelino Ernesto, better known as Telinho (born 15 October 1988) is a Mozambican football winger who currently plays for Moçambola club UD Songo and the Mozambique national team. He previously played for Liga Muçulmana, Ferroviário Pemba, Naval 1º de Maio in Portugal and Ajax Cape Town in South Africa."Eusébio e Telinho reforçam Naval 1º de Maio"Telinho off to Portugal Telinho won the Moçambola national title in 2011 and the Taça de Moçambique in 2012 while playing for Liga Muçulmana in Mozambique, making two appearances in the CAF Champions League while scoring once during his tenure with the club as well."Moçambola: Liga Muçulmana sem travões e isolada no topo! In 2014, Telinho returned to his former club Liga Muçulmana, following an unsuccessful trial with Portuguese Primeira Liga club C.D. Nacional."Moçambola 2014: Muçulmanos regressam as vitórias com "hat-trick" de Zico ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Mozambique's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
